import './ReviewCard.css' import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { deleteReview } from '../../store/reviewReducer' const ReviewCard = ({review}) => { console.log('review in card: ', review) const dispatch = useDispatch() const handleDelete= async() =>{ const deletespot = await dispatch(deleteReview(review.id)) return deletespot } if(review) return(

{review?.User.firstName}

{review.stars}

{review.review}

) else return null } export default ReviewCard
